name: FREEMAN HEALTH SYSTEM
sampleDescriptions: Analyze and counsel Freeman Health System regarding their Public Provider Relief monies that are owed to them as well as engage certain Members of Congress to find out why the owned monies still have
Advocated for congressional inquiry to HHS related to Freeman's application for provider relief funds.
Counseled client on the Public Relief Fund (PRF) program and apprised congressional staff on client's application status within the PRF process.
